sections.title: Overview: ChatGPT vs Gradio
paragraphs: ChatGPT (generative ai) is ChatGPT is a generative AI platform enabling users with advanced creative and productivity capabilities.. It's known for AI, NLP, OpenAI.

Gradio (ml frameworks) is Python library for building machine learning demos and web applications with simple interface creation for ML models.. Users choose it for UI Framework, ML Demos, Prototyping.
